import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import poster1 from "../media/poster/poster-1.png"; import poster2 from "../media/poster/poster-2.png"; import poster3 from "../media/poster/poster-3.png"; import poster4 from "../media/poster/poster-4.png"; import poster5 from "../media/poster/poster-5.png"; import poster6 from "../media/poster/poster-6.png"; import poster7 from "../media/poster/poster-7.png"; import MovieSearch from "./movie/SearchMovie"; export default function Promo() { return (

Millions of movies, TV shows and people to discover.
